TraitDef.label: Radiant
TraitDef.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has been chosen by ancient forces and gifted with mystical abilities.

li.label: Nahel-Touched
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has unknowingly begun walking the path of the Knights Radiant. A mysterious presence watches over them.

li.label: Oathbound Protector
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has spoken the Second Ideal, vowing to protect those who cannot protect themselves. Their bond with their spren strengthens, and their control over Stormlight grows.

li.label: Windsworn Knight
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has sworn to protect even those they despise, solidifying their Radiant path. They now wield full control over Gravitation, soaring freely through the air.

li.label: Stormforged Guardian
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has confronted the limits of their protection, realizing they cannot save everyone. They now wield a living Shardblade, a weapon of pure Investiture tied to their soul.

li.label: Beacon of Honor
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has embraced the final Ideal of the Windrunners, becoming a true master of protection and leadership. Their bond grants them the ability to manifest Shardplate.

TraitDef.label: Radiant
TraitDef.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has been chosen by ancient forces and gifted with mystical abilities.

li.label: Bonded Initiate
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has formed a bond with a spren, a mysterious entity from the Cognitive Realm. The path to knighthood has begun.

li.label: Sworn Protector
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has begun to understand their connection with the spren. Their ability to manipulate Stormlight grows.

li.label: Healing master
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has deepened their bond, gaining increased control over Stormlight and the ability to move through the air.

li.label: Knight Radiant - Truthwatcher
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} has spoken their final oath and become a true Knight Radiant. Their mastery over Stormlight allows them to summon a Shardblade at will.
